# TextureCubemapArrayRD

**Inherits:** [TextureLayeredRD](TextureLayeredRD.md) **\<** [TextureLayered](TextureLayered.md) **\<** [Texture](Texture.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

Texture Array for Cubemaps that is bound to a texture created on the [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This texture class allows you to use a cubemap array texture created directly on the [RenderingDevice](RenderingDevice.md) as a texture for materials, meshes, etc.
